div.div: Created new branch main in tmchuynh/tien-len

Removes unused testimonial components and imports
Comments out testimonial sections in contact and info components to clean up the UI.
Updates testimonial index reference to use first testimonial instead of fifth.
Eliminates unused testimonial imports to reduce bundle size.
Enhances ServicesPage layout and styling; adds dynamic grid spans for sub-services and improves card presentations for better user engagement.
Refactors HowWeCanHelpYou component to enhance layout and styling; updates service links with improved descriptions and visuals for better user engagement.
Implement new feature for user authentication and improve error handling
Enhances TwoColumnTextImage component with improved layout and styling; adds carousel controls and refines text presentation for better user experience.
Refactors TestimonialCard component by removing unused star rating display and optimizing layout; updates Timeline component for improved styling consistency.

Removes redundant expertise section component
Eliminates duplicate content that was likely consolidated into a more comprehensive component structure.
Streamlines the about page architecture by removing the standalone expertise component that contained 4000+ lines of SVG icons and service descriptions.

Consolidates motivational drives and removes timeline images
Merges "Community Impact" and "Sustainability" sections into a single cohesive value proposition to reduce redundancy and improve messaging clarity.
Removes all image content from timeline entries and makes content property optional in the interface, simplifying the timeline component and reducing visual clutter while maintaining the descriptive text content.

Redesigns homepage with premium styling and layout
Transforms the homepage into a more sophisticated and visually appealing design with:
- Adds gradient backgrounds and elevated spacing throughout sections - Improves typography with refined font weights and sizing - Enhances section headers with centered layouts and decorative elements - Refines carousel controls with premium styling and hover effects - Updates pagination indicators with modern pill-style designs - Increases carousel autoplay delays for better user experience - Improves responsive spacing and container max-widths - Adds elegant CTA section styling with dark gradient background
Creates a more polished and professional user experience while maintaining functionality.
Reorder import statements in blog-helpers for consistency

Add new blog posts on website optimization, design communication, hiring designers, and the importance of writing for developers
- Created "How to Optimize Your Website for Maximum Conversion" by Sarah Johnson - Created "Key Details to Share with Your Designer Before Kicking Off a Project" by Tina Huynh - Created "Key Factors to Consider When Hiring a Designer or Developer" by Tina Huynh - Created "Unlocking Creativity: The Power of Writing for Developers" by Tina Huynh
Add financial management and IoT development blog posts; refactor featured blogs fetching logic
Add new blog posts on Google Analytics and constructive feedback for designers; implement API route for fetching featured blogs

Add new blog posts on real estate impact, commercial space selection, business planning, data analytics, and decision-making strategies
- "How the Real Estate Market Affects Small Business Owners" explores the influence of real estate trends on small businesses, covering lease costs, location dynamics, and workforce accessibility. - "How to Choose the Right Commercial Space for Your Business" provides a comprehensive guide on evaluating commercial leases, location, space requirements, and negotiating terms. - "How to Create a Successful Business Plan" outlines the essential components of a business plan, including market analysis, marketing strategy, operations plan, and financial projections. - "How to Use Data Analytics for Smarter Business Decisions" discusses leveraging data analytics to identify trends, enhance operational efficiency, improve customer insights, and refine financial forecasting.
Add new blog post on harnessing artificial intelligence for business growth

Removes legacy blog renderer component
Eliminates outdated blog rendering implementation that is no longer needed.
Cleans up codebase by removing unused recursive list rendering logic and legacy blog post display functionality.

Removes legacy blog system in favor of MDX-only approach
Streamlines blog architecture by eliminating dual blog post systems
Removes fallback logic for legacy blog posts and simplifies routing to use only MDX-based content, reducing complexity and maintenance overhead while ensuring consistent content management workflow

Adds MDX file validation script
Creates a comprehensive validation tool to verify converted MDX blog files are properly structured and contain required metadata fields.
Validates blog post integrity by checking for essential fields like author, date, excerpt, topics, and content, while providing detailed reporting on validation results and summary statistics.
Enables quality assurance for blog migration processes and helps identify missing or malformed content during development.

Adds script to convert blog posts from TS to MDX format
Creates automated conversion tool that transforms existing TypeScript blog post data into individual MDX files with proper frontmatter and markdown formatting.
Handles title-to-slug conversion, date formatting, and hierarchical content structure transformation while preserving existing files to prevent overwrites.
Enables migration from programmatic blog data to file-based content management system.

Adds unified blog helpers for MDX and legacy content
Introduces utility functions to handle both MDX and legacy blog posts seamlessly. Provides methods to retrieve all blog slugs, filter featured posts, and search by topic across both content sources.
Enables consistent blog operations regardless of content format and simplifies blog data management throughout the application.

Adds custom MDX component styling configuration
Creates a comprehensive styling system for MDX components with consistent design tokens and responsive behavior.
Implements custom styling for all standard HTML elements including headings, paragraphs, lists, code blocks, images, links, and tables. Uses Tailwind CSS classes with semantic color tokens for theming consistency.
Enhances user experience with proper spacing, typography hierarchy, and accessibility features like external link handling and image optimization through Next.js Image component.

Adds legacy blog renderer and MDX blog interface
Introduces a dedicated component for rendering legacy blog posts with recursive list support and complex styling for nested content structures.
Extends blog interface definitions to support both legacy and MDX-based blog formats, enabling content migration and dual rendering capabilities.

Adds MDX blog support with legacy fallback
Introduces support for MDX-based blog posts while maintaining backward compatibility with existing blog posts. The API now first attempts to fetch MDX content before falling back to legacy blog data, enabling a gradual migration path.
Updates error handling and code formatting for consistency.

Removes blog post about digital economy for small business
Cleans up blog posts collection by removing outdated content about small business digital transformation strategies
Streamlines the blog posts array to focus on more relevant content while maintaining the existing structure and formatting

Adds MDX blog rendering system with footer component
Introduces a complete MDX blog system that enables rendering of markdown blog posts with frontmatter metadata.
Includes utilities for reading and parsing blog files from the filesystem, with support for featured posts and topic-based filtering.
Provides a reusable footer component that displays related topics as clickable links and encourages further reading through the blog section.

Refactors blog post routing to support MDX posts
Converts blog post page from client-side to server-side rendering with dual support for new MDX-based posts and legacy blog posts.
Prioritizes MDX posts when available, falling back to legacy posts for backward compatibility. Combines both post types in the blog listing page for unified content management.
Improves performance by eliminating client-side data fetching and loading states while maintaining existing functionality.

Adds MDX support for blog functionality
Configures Next.js to process MDX files by adding @next/mdx integration and extending page extensions to include .md and .mdx files.
Installs necessary dependencies for MDX rendering and frontmatter parsing including next-mdx-remote and gray-matter.
Adds Tailwind CSS typography plugin to improve prose styling for blog content.
Includes new npm scripts for blog management operations like creating posts and listing existing content.

Adds script to generate new MDX blog posts
Automates the creation of new blog posts with proper frontmatter structure and content template.
Generates URL-friendly slugs from titles and sets up the file in the correct directory structure with placeholder content, making it easier for content creators to start writing immediately.

Adds MDX support for markdown content with JSX
Enables processing and rendering of MDX files by installing the core MDX ecosystem packages including the loader, React integration, and Next.js plugin.
Supports writing interactive documentation and content that combines markdown syntax with React components.
Implement code changes to enhance functionality and improve performance
